clues.question: In "God of the Woods", what year does Bear go missing?
In "Bury Our Bones in the Midnight Soil", Jocelyn is to Charlotte who?
clues.answer: Her childhood best friend and first love

clues.question: This novel features a struggling author who ghostwrites for a famous novelist and discovers sinister secrets.
Charlie and Eve move to a home on the side of a mountain nicknamed this in "We Used to Live Here".
In "The Seven Year Slip", Rhonda is to Clementine who?
These men were accused of raping Rebecca Foster.
Matteo’s human lover in the novel is named who?
In "Funny Story", Jason is to Holly who?
In "The Frozen River", Martha hopes not to see this on Dr. Coleman’s counter.
Frankie’s older brother who is killed in action is named who?
This director and star of "It Ends With Us" was engaged in a lawsuit with Blake Lively.
In "Twilight: New Moon", the line “Where the hell have you BEEN, Loca?” is spoken by this actor.
Sam Claflin plays Finnick Odair and also this character in "Daisy Jones & The Six".
The HBO series "Game of Thrones" is based on this book series.
clues.answer: A Song of Ice and Fire

clues.question: In which film does a character with lavender hair exclaim, “That is Mahogany!”?
This book follows a huntress traveling through a magical realm to atone for a crime.
clues.answer: A Court of Thorns and Roses

clues.question: This Kristin Hannah novel takes place in America’s “Last Frontier.”
In "Stillhouse Lake", Gwen refers to her internet research on trolls by this name.
This finale novel concludes a multi-book fantasy series with a world-ending battle.
In this 2023 release, the protagonist is forced into a brutal war college with deadly trials.
In "The Women", Frankie recovers at a ranch located in this state.
In "We Are Legion", Andrea is to Alaina who?
In "God of the Woods", Tracy is to Barbara who?
Gwen purchases a vehicle from this man who works at the gun range.
Grace discovers the disappearance of this local woman.
